source_sentence: 佛說如來不思議祕密大乘經卷
translation: Foshuo rulai busiyi mimi dasheng jing roll

source_sentence: 第十五
translation: fifteenth

source_sentence: 西天譯經三藏朝散大夫
translation: Tripiṭaka of the Western Paradise Translation Sutra, Chaosan Dashi

source_sentence: 試光祿卿傳梵大師賜紫
translation: Guangluqing zhuanfan dashi gongsi

source_sentence: 沙門臣法護等奉　詔譯
translation: Translated by imperial order by the monks, ministers, and others, Fahou

source_sentence: 入曠野大城受食品第十八之餘
translation: the eighteenth time I entered the great city of Kuwano and received food

source_sentence: ◎爾時，金剛手菩薩大祕密主又過夜分，即告四大天王言：「諸仁者！
translation: After the night passed, the Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva, the Great Esoteric Master, addressed the four heavenly kings, saying, "Gentlemen!

source_sentence: 汝等當知，我今請佛并大菩薩、諸聲聞眾，降我所止祕密宮中，期滿七日微伸供養；以佛世尊悲愍我故而受我請。
translation: All of you should know that I've invited the Buddha, the great bodhisattvas, and the śrāvakas to come down to me and stay in my secret palace for seven full days to make modest offerings; the Bhagavān accepts my invitation because he has compassion for me.

source_sentence: 汝等各有力能廣多眷屬，於七晝夜中勿生放逸，勿起亂心，亦復且止諸餘作事，專一精勤供養於佛。
translation: Each of you has the strength to gather a large retinue, so don't become careless or distracted during the seven days and nights, and also stop doing other tasks while focusing your attention and diligence on making offerings to the Buddha.

source_sentence: 乃至此曠野大城所止一切夜叉、羅剎、必隷多、鳩盤茶、必舍左、乾闥婆、摩睺羅伽等，并餘所住諸眾生類，以我教勅悉告語之：『眾等應知。
translation: Even all the yakṣas, rājas, pretails, kumbhāṇḍas, piśāsas, gandharvas, mahoragas, and other living beings who are staying in this large wilderness city are told by my instructions, 'All of you should know this.

source_sentence: 金剛手菩薩請佛世尊來降於此曠野大城，期滿七日作供養事。
translation: The Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva invited the Bhagavān to come down to this great city in the wilderness for seven days to make offerings.

source_sentence: 汝等宜應攝諸恚惡、發清淨心，復起廣大歡喜之意，嚴供世尊聽受正法。』」
translation: It's appropriate for all of you to subdue anger and ill-will, arouse a pure mind, and give solemn offerings to the Bhagavān in the hope of receiving the right teaching.'"

source_sentence: 爾時金剛手菩薩大祕密主即告長子金剛軍言：「賢者！
translation: It was then that the Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva, the great esoteric lord, addressed his eldest son, Vajrasena, saying, "Good man!

source_sentence: 汝今宜應以自神力往彼梵界，自梵眾天至色究竟天，於彼諸天各告語云：『金剛手菩薩大祕密主請佛世尊來降曠野大城祕密宮中，期滿七日作供養事。
translation: Now, you should use your own spiritual powers to go to the Brahma realm and go from the Brahmakāyika gods to the Formation Celestial and tell each of the gods, 'The Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva, the great mystic lord, invites the Bhagavān to descend to the secret palace of the great city in the wilderness for seven days to make offerings.

source_sentence: 汝等諸天欲見佛者，宜速來此。』」
translation: All of you gods who want to see the Buddha should come here quickly.'"

source_sentence: 是時祕密主長子金剛軍受父教令，即如其命。
translation: The eldest son of the Lord of Secrets, Vajrasena, then complied with his father's order.

source_sentence: 爾時金剛手菩薩大祕密主復告次子妙臂言：「賢者！
translation: The Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva, the lord of great secrets, then addressed his second son, Miaobi, saying, "Good man!

source_sentence: 汝今宜應以自神力往地居天至空居天，謂四大王天、忉利天、夜摩天、兜率天、化樂天、他化自在天，於彼諸天各告語云：『金剛手菩薩大祕密主請佛世尊來降曠野大城祕密宮中，期滿七日作供養事。
translation: Now, you should use your own psychic powers to go to the Earth-dwelling Heaven to the Air-dwelling Heaven, which is the Heaven of the Four Great Kings, the Heaven of the Thirty-three, the Heaven of the Nightmare, the Tuṣita Heaven, the Heaven of the Nirmāṇarati, and the Heaven of the Paranirmitavaśavartin, and tell each of those heavens, 'The Vajrapaṇi Bodhisattva, the great mystic lord, invites the Bhagavān to descend into the secret palace of the great city in the wilderness for seven days to make offerings.

source_sentence: 汝等諸天欲見佛者，宜速來此。』」
translation: All of you gods who want to see the Buddha should come here quickly.'"

source_sentence: 是時次子妙臂受父教令，即如其命。
translation: The second son, Miaobi, then, having been instructed by his father, did as he was told.

source_sentence: 爾時於剎那間即有廣多無數百千欲界天子、色界天子，周匝充滿百千由旬之量，填塞空中。
translation: Instantaneously, there appeared in the sky a vast and incalculable number of hundreds of thousands of gods in the desire realm and form realm, filling the sky with a hundred thousand leagues in circumference.

source_sentence: 爾時金剛手菩薩大祕密主又過夜分，即為世尊敷設臥具妙嚴飾已，右膝著地，合掌諦誠向佛世尊，說妙伽陀而伸勤請：「善來最勝人中尊，　　善來人中無上士，　人中增勝願降臨，　　佛大牟尼時已至。
translation: After the night passed, the Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva, the Great Esoteric Master, spread out his bedding and decorated it with marvelous finery for the Bhagavān, knelt on his right knee, folded his palms in sincerity, and addressed the Bhagavān, saying, "Well come, most excellent among men, excellent among men, unsurpassed among men, superior among men, may I descend, the time has come for the great Buddha Muni to arrive.

source_sentence: 善來最勝二足尊，　　善來二足尊最上，　二足增勝願降臨，　　佛大牟尼時已至。
translation: Well come, most honored among men, well come, most honored among the two-legged, two-legged and superior, may I descend, for the time of the Buddha, the Great Muni, has arrived.

source_sentence: 佛大蓮華淨戒生，　　精進定水常增長，　如蜂採華眾所歸，　　寂靜蓮華願來降。
translation: The Buddha's great lotus-pure precepts arise, the water of concentration and diligence always increases, like a bee gathering flowers to which many people return, the still lotus wishes to descend.

source_sentence: 最初安立四聖諦，　　以慈悲眼遍觀察，　常能震吼無我音，　　佛大師子願來降。
translation: Initially established in the four noble truths, he observes them with the eye of compassion, always shouting a selfless voice, and the Buddha's great disciple vows to come down.

source_sentence: 戒為根本念為莖，　　覺支華秀常茂盛，　解脫智果已周圓，　　佛大樹王願來降。
translation: With morality as his root and mindfulness as his stem, the flower of the awakening factor always flourishes, and the fruit of wisdom of liberation is fully consummated, the Buddha's great king of trees vows to come and subdue him.

source_sentence: 妙慧甚深復廣博，　　湛然定水遍清涼，　眾行圓明大導師，　　佛功德海願來降。
translation: Marvelous wisdom is deep and broad, the waters of azure concentration are perfectly cool, the practices of all are perfectly luminous, and the great guide, the Buddha's ocean of merit, desires to descend.

source_sentence: 大悲所成吉祥體，　　大慧光明廣莊嚴，　蓮華開覺眾所歸，　　佛日光明願來降。
translation: The auspicious body of great compassion, the vast adornment of the light of great wisdom, the lotus flower that awakens all people, the Buddha's sunbeams vow to subdue.

source_sentence: 正語震伏諸邪論，　　解脫藥樹救沈痾，　小根群鹿悉開明，　　佛大山王願來降。」
translation: His right speech quells wrong theories, his medicinal tree of liberation saves his sunken sickness, the deer with lesser faculties are all enlightened, and the Buddha, the great king of mountains, wishes to subdue them."

source_sentence: 爾時世尊受金剛手菩薩大祕密主至誠勤請，知時已至，即告苾芻眾言：「汝等宜應著衣持鉢往赴金剛手請，期滿七日作供養事。
translation: Accepting the Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva's great esoteric lord's earnest invitation, the Bhagavān then knew the time had come and addressed the crowd of monks, saying, "It's time for you to put on your robes and take your bowls to the Vajrapāṇi and make offerings for the seventh day.

source_sentence: 善哉行矣，今正是時。」
translation: It's good that you're doing this, for now is the right time."

source_sentence: 付囑守護僧坊之者：「今此眾中，諸有已得神通之者菩薩、聲聞，各各隨應以自神力游空而往。
translation: He instructed the guardians of the saṃgha's mansion, "Now, among these people, there are bodhisattvas and śrāvakas who have attained supernormal powers, so each should use his or her own supernormal powers to travel into the sky and go there.

source_sentence: 若復未具神力之者，應當隨入如來清淨大圓光中游空而往。」
translation: Those who have yet to attain supernormal powers should follow the Tathāgata into the pure, great, and perfect light of the Tathāgata and travel into space."

source_sentence: 爾時世尊即於王舍大城鷲峯山中隱身不現，菩薩、聲聞恭敬圍繞，放大光明普遍照曜，天人天女導前從後歌詠稱讚，奏百千種俱胝那庾多鼓吹音樂震動大地，天雨種種殊妙寶華。
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān withdrew himself from view on Vulture Peak in the great city of Rājagṛha, surrounded by respectful bodhisattvas and śrāvakas, with a magnificent radiance that radiated universally, gods and goddesses leading the way, singing and praising from front to back, playing a hundred thousand kinds of corti-nayuta drums and blowing music that shook the earth, and the heavens raining down a variety of marvelous jewels and flowers.

source_sentence: 於佛剎中廣現種種佛大威力、佛大神通、佛大施作、佛大變化、佛大吉祥、佛大勝光、佛大威儀、佛大游戲等相，游空自在，往詣於彼曠野大城。
translation: In the buddha's buddha-stage, they gave a wide variety of appearances of the Buddha's great authority, his great superknowledge, his great works of merit, his great transformations, his great good fortune, his great radiance, his great comportment, and his great play, wandering freely into space, and they went to that great city in the wilderness.

source_sentence: 是時世尊處虛空中猶如鵝王，進止安詳自在而行。
translation: The Bhagavān then was like a king goose in the sky, moving calmly and unhindered.

source_sentence: 彼欲色界諸天子眾，遙見世尊高處空中猶如鵝王宛轉自在，咸生歡喜適悅慶快；又如日輪初出清淨可愛，如圓滿月瑩潔光明眾星圍繞，如帝釋天主天眾圍繞，如大梵王梵眾圍繞，天眾見已即起清淨希有之心，各持種種天妙香華供養於佛。
translation: When they saw the Bhagavān high in the sky like a king goose moving about freely, they were all delighted and rejoiced. They were like the first appearance of a sun wheel that's pure and lovely, like a full moon that's bright and clear, surrounded by stars, like the gods of Indra, and like the Brahmā and the crowds of priests, and when they saw that, the gods arouse pure and rare aspirations and each carries a variety of wonderful fragrances and flowers from heaven to offer to the Buddha.

source_sentence: 所謂天優鉢羅華、俱母陀華、奔拏利迦華、曼陀羅華、摩訶曼陀羅華、波利質多羅華、摩訶波利質多羅華、曼殊沙華、摩訶曼殊沙華、可愛華、大可愛華、輪大輪華、陸生諸華，及餘殊妙最勝香華具有百葉或千葉者，及焰光華、光味華、遍香華、常香華、常開華、悅目華，此如是等并餘無量勝妙香華，遍散佛上。
translation: These were the celestial blue lotus, the kumuda flower, the puṇḍarīka flower, the mandāra flower, the mahāmandāra flower, the pārijātāra flower, the mahāpārijātāra flower, the mañjūṣaka flower, the mahāmājūṣaka flower, the desirable flower, the great desirable flower, the wheel-turning flower, the land-born flowers, and other wonderful, most excellent fragrant flowers with a hundred or a thousand leaves, as well as the flaming flower, the flower of light and taste, the pervasive fragrance, the ever-present fragrance, the ever-opening flower, the eye-pleasing flower, and these and other incalculably wonderful fragrant flowers that were scattered all over the Buddha.

source_sentence: 又復安立殊妙幡幢，奏以百千殊妙音樂。
translation: He also erected a marvelous banner and played a hundred thousand marvelous sounds and music.

source_sentence: 爾時世尊現如是等殊妙勝相香華幢蓋、鼓奏音樂眾莊嚴事，於須臾頃即至曠野大城，而先暫適毘沙門天王宮。
translation: The Bhagavān then, displaying such marvelous and excellent appearances as these, scented banners, floral canopies, drums, and music, all of which were adorned, arrived at the great city in the wilderness in a short time and was first temporarily transported to the palace of Vaiśravaṇa.

source_sentence: 佛及菩薩、聲聞大眾，從空而下入彼宮中。
translation: The Buddha, the bodhisattvas, and the śrāvakas descended from the sky and entered that palace.

source_sentence: 爾時大地普遍震動，而復柔軟殊妙可愛，亦不嬈惱一切眾生。
translation: At that moment, the earth shook universally, yet it was soft and marvelously lovely, and didn't disturb all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 爾時四大天王知佛世尊已至曠野大城之中，各從所守方分與諸眷屬，持以種種殊妙香華速來佛所。
translation: Knowing that the Bhagavān had arrived in the great city in the wilderness, each of the four celestial kings brought his retinue from the direction he was guarding and quickly came to the Buddha with a variety of exquisite flowers and fragrances.

source_sentence: 時四天王到已，頭面頂禮佛足，即以所持殊妙香華散於佛上而伸供養，合掌諦誠退住一面；彼諸眷屬亦各至誠頂禮佛足合掌而住。
translation: When the four heavenly kings arrived, they bowed their heads at the Buddha's feet, scattered the exquisite fragrances and flowers they were carrying on top of him, extended offerings, closed their palms in sincerity, and withdrew to one side; each of their retinues also bowed their heads at the Buddha's feet in sincerity, closed their palms, and stayed there.

source_sentence: 佛即略為四天王等眷屬眾會宣說法要。
translation: The Buddha then briefly explained the essentials of the Dharma for the council of the four heavenly kings and other retinues.

source_sentence: 是時會中即有十千夜叉、羅剎、龍、乾闥婆、鳩盤茶等，覩佛勝相，悉發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translation: At that time, ten thousand yakṣas, rājas, dragons, gandharvas, kumbhāṇḍas, and others looked at the Buddha's remarkable features and all arouse the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 彼四大天王宮嬪眷屬中有十千天女，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translation: Among their retinues in the palaces of the four great celestial kings were 10,000 goddesses who had aroused the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 爾時金剛手菩薩大祕密主與自眷屬，各各持以如無邊功德莊嚴世界之中殊妙香華、塗香末香、寶幢幡蓋，鼓吹歌音作諸伎樂，速詣毘沙門天王宮中佛世尊所。
translation: At the time, the Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva, the Great Esoteric Master, and his retinue each carried a collection of exquisite flowers and incense, coated incense and fragrances, jeweled banners and flags, and music and music performed by drums and musicians to the palace of the Bhagavān in the Vaiśravaṇa Heavenly Kings.

source_sentence: 到已頭面頂禮佛足右繞七匝，即以所持妙香華等諸供養具，嚴潔諦誠供養世尊。
translation: When he arrived, he bowed his head at the Buddha's feet and circled him seven times to his right, and then he presented the Bhagavān with the wonderful fragrant flowers and other offerings he had in his possession, making a clean and sincere offering to the Bhagavān.

source_sentence: 諸眷屬等奏妙音樂，嚴奉肅恭歸命頂禮，迎導世尊并諸菩薩、聲聞大眾，入自宮中。
translation: The members of his retinue performed marvelous music, paid homage with respect and dignity, and welcomed the Bhagavān, the bodhisattvas, and the śrāvakas into their palace.

source_sentence: 到已如次請各就座。
translation: When they arrived, they were invited to take their seats in order.

source_sentence: 爾時世尊處彼殊妙種種莊嚴師子之座，并諸菩薩、聲聞大眾亦各就座。
translation: The Bhagavān then took his seat at the lion's seat, which was adorned with a variety of marvels, and the bodhisattvas and śrāvakas also took their seats.

source_sentence: 爾時金剛手菩薩大祕密主即告帝釋、梵王、護世天等并餘一切諸天子言：「汝等宜應各務精勤，隨喜成辦嚴供世尊，當令汝等增長施福。」
translation: It was then that the Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva, the Great Esoteric Master, addressed Tishri, Brahmā, the world-protecting gods, and all the other sons of gods, saying, "It's appropriate for you to each work diligently and joyfully accomplish adorned offerings to the Bhagavān, which will cause you to increase your merits."

source_sentence: 爾時諸天子眾見是最勝境界殊妙莊嚴師子座已，生希有心，咸作是言：「此之勝相何力致邪？
translation: After the lords of the gods and goddesses saw this most excellent state of marvelous adornment of the lion's throne, they became rarefied and each said, "What power did this excellent feature have to cause this?

source_sentence: 為佛世尊威神力邪？
translation: Is it because of the authority and power of the Bhagavān?

source_sentence: 為金剛手大祕密主威神力邪？」
translation: Is this the authoritative power of the Vajrapaṇi, the great esoteric lord?"

source_sentence: 即聞空中有聲告言：「諸仁者！
translation: I then heard a voice in the air saying, "Gentlemen!

source_sentence: 此是大祕密主威神所致。
translation: "This is the result of the authority of the great mysterious lord.

source_sentence: 東方去此過殑伽沙數等佛土已，有世界名無邊功德寶莊嚴，佛號莊嚴王。
translation: In the east, beyond the sands of this Buddha land, there's a world called Sugatacetana, the jeweled adornment of infinite merit, which the Buddha calls Sugatacetana.

source_sentence: 金剛手菩薩大祕密主見彼世界種種殊勝妙莊嚴事，以祕密主威神力故，令此宮中同彼世界勝莊嚴相。」
translation: The Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva, the great mystic lord, sees all the extraordinary and marvelous adornments of that world and causes this palace to resemble the superb adornments of that world because of the authority and power of the mystic lord."

source_sentence: 爾時世尊安處勝妙師子座已，即時曠野大城所居一切夜叉、羅剎、必舍左、鳩盤茶、乾闥婆、摩睺羅伽等眾，皆悉來詣佛世尊所，頭面著地頂禮佛足，合掌虔恭退住一面。
translation: After the Bhagavān had been installed on the marvelous lion seat, immediately all the yakṣas, rājas, piśācīs, kumbhāṇḍas, gandharvas, mahoragas, and others living in the great wilderness city came to the Bhagavān, bowed their heads to the ground at the Buddha's feet, put their palms together, and reverently withdrew to one side.

source_sentence: 爾時金剛手菩薩大祕密主即告四大天王并餘一切諸眾會言：「汝等宜應咸來助我同發至誠，嚴以清淨殊妙飲食奉上世尊，使令汝等獲大利益。」
translation: At that point, the Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva, the Great Esoteric Master, addressed the four heavenly kings and all the other congregations, saying, "It's appropriate for all of you to come to my aid and join me in sincerely and solemnly presenting the Bhagavān with a pure and wonderful meal that will greatly benefit you all."

source_sentence: 爾時金剛手菩薩大祕密主即與眷屬眾會，自手清潔嚴辦最上百味精珍，菩薩深心清淨如來所應供養，發最勝心，奉上世尊并諸菩薩、聲聞大眾，悉令充足。
translation: It was then that the Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva, the Great Esoteric Master, and his retinue assembled, cleaned their own hands, decorated, and prepared the highest hundred flavors and delicacies that the bodhisattva had the profound heart and pure mind to offer to the Tathāgata, and with the most excellent intentions, presented them to the Bhagavān and the masses of bodhisattvas and śrāvakas, making them all plentiful.

source_sentence: 飯食事訖，而復奉上清淨香水盥手滌器，乃於佛前退坐聽法。
translation: When the meal was finished, he again presented them with pure perfume to wash their hands and wash their vessels, and then retired to sit in front of the Buddha and listen to the teaching.

source_sentence: 是時曠野大城所居一切夜叉、羅剎、必舍左等，各各諦誠瞻仰世尊，合掌虔恭歸命頂禮。
translation: At the time, all the yakṣas, rāṣas, piśācīs, and so forth living in the great city of Kālôdayin looked up to the Bhagavān with sincerity and reverently bowed with folded hands in homage.

source_sentence: 佛說如來不思議祕密大乘經卷第十五
translation: The Tathāgata's Inconceivable Secret Great Vehicle Sutra, Volume 15
